ModMetaData.name: Quick Jump to Location
ModMetaData.author: 1trickPwnyta
ModMetaData.description:
You can middle-click on a letter to simultaneously dismiss it and jump to the location it references (if there is one).
=== Updates === 06/17/2025: Updated to 1.6 03/20/2024: Updated to 1.5 10/26/2022: Updated to 1.4 03/10/2022: Added option to jump to location only without dismissing.
=== Credits === Mod icon: twitter.com/mouse_draws
